alert.note: Alert for Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:19PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nuckolls and northwestern Thayer Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 519 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Davenport, or 34 miles north of Belleville, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Davenport and Ruskin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
